content:
The representative of the GUR of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine Vadim Skibitsky said that Russia has almost no use in the fall of 2023 the winged rockets "Caliber".

About thisinformsMain Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine.

“The aggressor accumulates the winged rockets of 3m14 caliber and has at least 260 units. And in their plans to produce 30 such missiles in April this year, ”said a representative of GUR MOU.

At the same time, he recalled that the Russians are modernizing the onyx anti -ship missiles.

"As for high -speed missiles flying from the southern direction, it is difficult to determine whether it is a" Zircon "missiles or onyxs," Vadim Skibitsky said, adding that the stocks of ordinary "onyxs" in Russia are 440 units.

As reported by the Armyinform, the Armed ForcesThey knocked the Russian droneworth almost $ 7 million.
title: Russians are modernizing the anti -ship missiles "Onyx" - GUR
description: The Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine informs about it. “The aggressor accumulates the stock ...
author: Army Inform
